Posts.Content: I have had breast pain in my left breast for months. I discovered i had a lump and went for a mammo and sono. It revealed that i have a fibrocystic nodule 0.5 cm in size and that is what is causing my pain. The pain is terrible and disrupts my everyday life. Went to see a surgeon and he told that it is nothing and i should be monitored every 6 weeks well now i am going for a second opnion hope someone can help me.
Posts.Title: nodule in breast
